faq.contactTitle: Didn't find an answer to your question?

general.a1: Document submission at Salymbekov HSM begins on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted both in person at the admissions office and online through our website.
general.q2: What educational programs does the HSM offer?
general.a2: Salymbekov HSM offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the KR.
general.q3: How long does the education last?
general.a3: The duration of education depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.q4: In what languages is education conducted?
general.a4: Education is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.q5: Is there practice in foreign clinics?
general.a5: Yes, the HSM cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.q6: Is the diploma recognized outside Kyrgyzstan?
general.a6: Salymbekov HSM diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification may be required according to local legislation.

general.admissionStart: Document submission at Salymbekov HSM starts on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted in person at the admission office or online through our website.
general.programs: Salymbekov HSM offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic.
general.duration: Study duration depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.languages: Teaching is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.internship: Yes, the HSM cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.diplomaRecognition: Salymbekov HSM diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification according to local legislation may be required.
general.exchangePrograms: Yes, the HSM participates in academic mobility programs with partner universities in Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey and other countries.
general.militaryDeferment: Yes, full-time students receive deferment from military service for the entire study period according to the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.

documents.required: Required documents: high school diploma, passport, medical certificate form 086U, ORT certificate, photos 3x4 (6 pcs), family composition certificate, income certificate (for benefits).
documents.nostrification: Yes, education documents obtained outside the Kyrgyz Republic are subject to mandatory nostrification in relevant state authorities.
documents.medicalValidity: Medical certificate form 086U is valid for 6 months from the date of issue. The certificate must contain all necessary medical examinations.
documents.onlineSubmission: Yes, you can apply online through our website. After application approval, you will need to provide original documents within 3 days.
documents.translation: Documents in Russian language do not require translation. Documents in other languages must be translated into Kyrgyz or Russian and notarized.
documents.lostDocuments: If documents are lost, they must be restored in the relevant authorities. For diploma contact your school, for passport - Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic. The procedure may take up to 30 days.

exams.subjects: For medical specialties (General Medicine, Dentistry): biology and chemistry. For Pharmacy: chemistry and biology. For Nursing: only biology. ORT certificate is also required.
exams.dates: Entrance exams are held from August 20 to 25. The exact schedule is published on the HSM website and in the admission office by August 15.
exams.minimumScore: Minimum ORT scores: General Medicine - 120, Dentistry - 110, Pharmacy - 100, Nursing - 90 points. For profile subjects - minimum 60% correct answers.
exams.retake: Retaking entrance exams is possible only in the next academic year. Only one attempt is given in the current year.
exams.preparation: The HSM conducts preparatory courses from May to July. Also recommend using textbooks for grades 10-11 in biology and chemistry, ORT tests from previous years.
exams.format: Exams are conducted in test form. Each test contains 40 questions, time limit - 90 minutes. Forms for computer processing of results are used.
exams.benefits: Benefits are provided to orphans, disabled people of groups I-II, combat veterans. Winners of republican olympiads are enrolled without exams.

payment.cost: Tuition fees: General Medicine - 180,000 KGS/year, Dentistry - 200,000 KGS/year, Pharmacy - 160,000 KGS/year, Nursing - 140,000 KGS/year. Prices may change annually.
payment.discounts: Yes, discounts are provided: 15% for excellent students (GPA 4.5+), 10% for full year payment, 5% for large families, benefits for socially vulnerable categories.
payment.installment: Yes, payment by semesters is possible (50% by September 1, 50% by February 1) or monthly (10 equal payments from September to June). Additional fee for installment - 5%.
payment.methods: Payment is possible by: bank transfer, online banking (Elsom, Balance.kg, MBank), cash at HSM cash desk, through payment terminals, bank card.
payment.included: The fee includes: lectures, practical classes, access to library, laboratory work, internet on campus. Additional payment for: textbooks, dormitory, meals.

hostel.availability: Yes, the HSM provides a modern dormitory for 200 places. Placement is by application in order of priority. Priority is given to non-resident students and orphans.
hostel.cost: The cost of accommodation is 3000 KGS per month per place in a room for 2-3 people. The price includes: utilities, internet, cleaning of common areas.
hostel.conditions: The dormitory is equipped with: furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchens on each floor, study rooms, Wi-Fi, video surveillance system, 24/7 security.
hostel.application: The application is submitted simultaneously with admission documents. You need to fill out a questionnaire, provide family income certificates, medical certificate, registration documents.

reviews.title: Student Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What our students say about studying at the HSM

student1.name: Anna Ivanova
student1.text: Studying at the medical faculty gave me invaluable knowledge and practical skills. The professors are experienced practicing doctors who share real-life expertise.

student2.name: Maksim Petrov
student2.text: An excellent combination of theory and practice! Already in the 3rd year, we started clinical training, which allows us to apply knowledge in real conditions.

student3.name: Elena Smirnova
student3.text: Modern equipment and an advanced approach to education. I especially value the simulation center where we can practice skills before clinical work.

student4.name: Dmitry Kozlov
student4.text: An engaging program with deep immersion in biochemistry and pharmacology. Professors support students‚Äô scientific initiatives.

student5.name: Olga Novikova
student5.text: I enrolled this year and I‚Äôm already impressed! The atmosphere encourages learning, with plenty of practical classes and modern laboratories.

mededu.title: 560001 - General Medicine
mededu.overviewText: The program prepares students for a career in medicine and healthcare. Key areas include: fundamental medical sciences, clinical practice, medical ethics and communication. The curriculum covers anatomy, physiology, pathology, pharmacology, clinical disciplines, and research work. Students may choose specializations in senior years (therapy, surgery, pediatrics, etc.). Mandatory clinical practice is provided in leading medical institutions. Upon graduation: eligibility for a medical license and employment in hospitals, clinics, and research institutes.
mededu.clinicalTraining: Clinical sites of the Higher School of Medicine

quote.text: Medicine is not just a profession, it is a calling that requires full dedication and continuous improvement. A true doctor must combine the knowledge of a scientist, the hands of a surgeon, and the heart of a humanist.
quote.author: ‚Äî Professor Ivan Petrov, HSM Founder

founder1.name: Professor Ivan Petrov
founder1.description: An outstanding medical scientist, Doctor of Medical Sciences, Academician of the RAMS. Founded the HSM in 1955 to train highly qualified medical personnel.
achievements: Founder of the School of Cardiology

founder2.name: Academician Maria Sidorova
founder2.position: Co-founder, Dean of the Faculty of Medicine
founder2.description: The first female academician in the field of surgery, a pioneer in the development of cardiovascular surgery in our country.
achievements: Author of the first textbook on cardiac surgery
Awarded the Order 'For Merit to the Fatherland'

founder3.name: Professor Alexander Kozlov
founder3.description: An outstanding organizer of medical education, creator of the modern system of training doctors.
achievements: Developed the concept of continuous medical education

founder4.name: Professor Elena Vasnetsova
founder4.description: An outstanding scientist in medical biochemistry, founder of the research institute at the HSM.
achievements: Discovery of new biochemical disease markers
Creation of a unique laboratory base

ivanov.name: Ivanov Ivan Ivanovich

achievements: Honored Doctor of the Russian Federation

Government of the Russian Federation Awardee

petrova.name: Petrova Anna Sergeevna
petrova.bio: Specialist in medical education organization. Under her leadership, modern educational technologies and digital learning platforms were implemented.
achievements: Honored Worker of Higher Education of the Russian Federation
Expert of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation

sidorov.name: Sidorov Alexey Vladimirovich
sidorov.bio: Leading scientist in molecular medicine. Organizer of international scientific conferences and research projects.
achievements: Member of the European Academy of Sciences
Head of Russian Science Foundation grants

kozlova.name: Kozlova Maria Dmitrievna
kozlova.position: Head of the Department of Therapy

nikolaev.name: Nikolaev Dmitry Petrovich

orlova.name: Orlova Elena Viktorovna
orlova.position: Head of the Department of Pediatrics
orlova.bio: Specialist in pediatric cardiology and neonatology. Author of unique treatment methods for congenital heart defects in children.

vasiliev.name: Vasiliev Sergey Igorevich
vasiliev.position: Head of the Department of Neurology
vasiliev.bio: Leading neurologist in the country, specialist in cerebrovascular diseases and neurorehabilitation.
achievements: President of the Association of Neurologists
Developer of national stroke treatment standards

smirnova.bio: Specialist in orthodontics and aesthetic dentistry. Developer of innovative prosthetic methods.

Holder of patents for dental structures

admission.title: Admission Committee
admission.heroTitle: Start Your Medical Career With Us
admission.heroSubtitle: Join the best HSM in the region
admission.introduction: Our HSM offers world-class education with modern facilities and experienced teaching staff. We prepare highly qualified specialists ready to meet the challenges of modern medicine.
admission.documentsDesc: Passport, educational documents, medical certificate, photos
admission.examsDesc: Biology, Chemistry, and language proficiency tests
admission.deadlinesDesc: Submit your application before the announced deadlines
admission.consultationDesc: Get detailed consultation about specialties and admission process
admission.faq1Answer: Tuition fees vary by specialty. Please contact our admission office for detailed information.
admission.faq2Answer: Yes, we provide comfortable dormitories for all non-resident students.
admission.faq3Answer: We offer General Medicine, Pediatrics, Dentistry, Pharmacy, and Nursing programs.
admission.footerText: We are always happy to help you with any questions about admission

admissionProcess.processDescription: Step-by-step guide to applying to the Medical School
admissionProcess.documentsDescription: Complete list of documents for application
admissionProcess.deadlinesDescription: Schedule of the admission campaign and key dates
admissionProcess.contactDescription: Contact information of the admissions committee
admissionProcess.title: Admission Process
admissionProcess.heroSubtitle: Step-by-step guide to joining our HSM
admissionProcess.step1Desc: Submit your application and required documents
admissionProcess.step1Details: Complete the online application form and upload all required documents. Make sure all information is accurate and documents are clear and readable.
admissionProcess.step2Details: Prepare for and take the entrance exams in core subjects. Results are typically available within 2 weeks after the exam date.
admissionProcess.step3Details: The interview assesses your motivation, communication skills, and suitability for the medical profession. Be prepared to discuss your career goals.
admissionProcess.step4Details: The admission committee reviews all submitted materials and makes the final decision. You will be notified by email and official letter.
admissionProcess.step5Details: After acceptance, complete the enrollment process by paying tuition fees and registering for classes. Welcome to our HSM!
admissionProcess.faq1Question: When does the application period start?
admissionProcess.faq1Answer: The application period typically starts on June 1st and ends on August 15th each year.
admissionProcess.faq2Question: Can I apply with international documents?
admissionProcess.faq2Answer: Yes, we accept international educational documents after they have been properly legalized and translated.
admissionProcess.faq3Question: Are there preparation courses for entrance exams?
admissionProcess.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer preparatory courses from April to June each year to help applicants prepare for entrance exams.
admissionProcess.faq4Question: What is the passing score for entrance exams?
admissionProcess.faq4Answer: The minimum passing score is 60% for each subject, but competitive programs may require higher scores.
admissionProcess.footerText: We are here to help you through every step of the admission process

classrooms.room101Desc: Large lecture hall with modern multimedia equipment, suitable for large groups and presentations
classrooms.room201Desc: Fully equipped biology laboratory with microscopes and research equipment
classrooms.room301Desc: Practical training room for medical procedures and patient care simulations
classrooms.room102Desc: Medium-sized lecture hall with comfortable seating and modern teaching aids
classrooms.room202Desc: Chemistry laboratory with safety equipment and modern analytical instruments
classrooms.room302Desc: Dental practice room with professional dental chairs and equipment
classrooms.bookingDesc: This room is available for booking by students and faculty members
classrooms.digitalClassroomsDesc: Interactive whiteboards, projectors, and audio systems in all lecture halls
classrooms.laboratoryEquipmentDesc: Modern microscopes, analyzers, and research equipment in laboratories
classrooms.simulationEquipmentDesc: Medical phantoms, simulation equipment for practical training
classrooms.footerText: Creating the best learning environment for future medical professionals

startups.title: Startups
startups.heroSubtitle: Transforming healthcare through student and faculty startups
startups.medAppDesc: AI-powered mobile application for patient monitoring and medication management
startups.bioSensorDesc: Wearable biosensor for real-time health monitoring and early disease detection
startups.drugDiscoveryDesc: Artificial intelligence platform for accelerating drug discovery process
startups.telemedDesc: Comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting patients with specialists
startups.prostheticDesc: Advanced prosthetic limbs with neural interface technology
startups.geneTherapyDesc: Innovative gene therapy solutions for rare genetic diseases
startups.fundingSupportDesc: Grants, seed funding, and investor connections for promising projects
startups.mentorshipDesc: Experienced mentors from medical and business communities
startups.labAccessDesc: Access to state-of-the-art laboratories and research facilities
startups.ctaDescription: Join our startup ecosystem and turn your innovative ideas into reality with our support and resources
startups.footerText: Building the future of healthcare through innovation and entrepreneurship
startups.medAppFullDesc: MedAssist is a comprehensive mobile healthcare platform that uses artificial intelligence to help patients manage their medications, track symptoms, and connect with healthcare providers. The app features smart reminders, drug interaction checks, and telehealth consultations.
startups.bioSensorFullDesc: BioSensor Pro is a breakthrough wearable device that continuously monitors vital signs and biomarkers. Using advanced sensors and machine learning algorithms, it can detect early signs of cardiovascular diseases and other health conditions.
startups.drugDiscoveryFullDesc: Our AI platform analyzes molecular structures and predicts drug efficacy, significantly reducing the time and cost of drug development. The system has already identified several promising compounds for further research.
startups.telemedFullDesc: TeleMed Platform provides secure video consultations, electronic prescriptions, and remote patient monitoring. It's designed to improve healthcare access in rural areas and reduce hospital visit costs.
startups.prostheticFullDesc: Smart Prosthetic incorporates advanced sensors and machine learning to provide natural movement and tactile feedback. The technology allows users to control prosthetic limbs with their neural signals.
startups.geneTherapyFullDesc: We're developing innovative gene editing techniques to treat rare genetic disorders. Our approach shows promising results in preclinical trials for several inherited conditions.
startups.drSmith: Dr. Sarah Smith - Chief Medical Officer
startups.story1Quote: The HSM's startup program provided not just funding, but crucial mentorship that helped us navigate the complex healthcare regulatory landscape.
startups.story2Quote: Access to advanced laboratories and expert guidance transformed our research project into a viable medical device company.

about.title: About the Quality Management System
about.description1: Our quality management system is an integrated approach to HSM management based on international standard ISO 9001:2015.
about.description2: The QMS covers all aspects of the HSM‚Äôs activities ‚Äî from the educational process to research and international cooperation.
about.description3: We strive to create an environment where quality becomes an integral part of corporate culture.

pps.subtitle: Quality Composition of the Higher School of Medicine Faculty
pps.quality_composition: Quality Composition of the Higher School of Medicine Faculty
pps.mission_text: The School sets three key goals: to meet the needs of the educational services market, to promote knowledge export, and to successfully implement multilingual education in Kyrgyzstan.
pps.faculty_text: To achieve these goals, the best domestic teachers and experts are involved in the educational process. The teaching staff is highly qualified, including more than 20 doctors and candidates of science. Educational programs are developed according to state standards.
pps.notable_professors: Leading Professors of the Medical School
pps.excellence_text: More than 20 doctors and candidates of science ensure the highest quality of education
